content: Peng Sun Peng Sun (孙 鹏) Associate Professor College of Computer Science and Electronic Engineering Hunan University Email: psun@hnu.edu.cn [Google Scholar] [Semantic Scholar] [ResearchGate] [ORCID] [Biography] | [Research Interests] | [Projects] | [Selected Publications] | [Services] | [Awards and Honors] Biography Peng Sun is currently an Associate Professor with Hunan University. Before that, he worked as a Postdoctoral Researcher with The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen, advised by Prof. Jianwei Huang. He received his Ph.D degree from Zhejiang University in 2020, advised by Prof. Zhi Wang and Prof. Zhibo Wang, and his B.E. degree from Tianjin University in 2015. From Nov. 2018 to Nov. 2019, he was a visiting Ph.D student with The University of Tennessee, Knoxville, where he conducted research under the supervision of Prof. Hairong Qi. Research Interests Internet of Things, Privacy and Security in Federated Learning, Mobile Crowdsensing, Compressive Sensing. Projects Research on Key Technologies for Efficient and Robust Federated Learning, Projects of the Young Scientists Fund, National Natural Science Foundation of China (NSFC), RMB 300,000, PI. Research on Key Technologies for Secure and Efficient Federated Learning, General Project, China Postdoctoral Science Foundation, RMB 80,000, PI.
